name: Wisp (SpellMender)
description:
Made for Trijam! The 3 hour game jam!

Theme: Faster... FASTER... F-A-S-T-E-R
In this RPG puzzle game you must re-trace your steps in order to proceed. You'll find that the more you play, the faster you will get at traversing the puzzles to complete the game!

Controls:
[WASD] or Arrow keys - Move
[E]  -  Confirm Dialogue Window

MUSIC BY RUNESTOMPER - https://soundcloud.com/runestomper

Progamming and Design by SpellMender

Discord - https://discord.gg/Rab99M4 Twitter - https://twitter.com/_NinjaMage Reddit - https://www.reddit.com/u/SpellMender

Leave a comment below! This is my first game with narrative.
